structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Quorum of board -- How business conducted.
law.text: A majority of the directors shall constitute a quorum and concurrence of the majority in any matter within the duties of the board shall be sufficient for its determination. All actions taken by the directors shall be by resolution, and in each instance the name and vote of each director shall be recorded in the minutes.
